commit message:
Gradle Fixes

Some small fixes to allow Gradle to work. Google released v20 and 21 of
the support library, and as we were not forcing a specific version, it
was choosing the newest. This caused issues with Crouton and also SDK
versioning. Force support library 19 to avoid the error. Additionally,
update the version of Crouton to pull in some bug fixes from it.
Rewrite (IGF & Detailview & SearchActivity) + Remove (ABS & SND) + Added (HEW)

Merge pull request #174 from ratan12/User_Interface

Major UI Changes

Convert to using Support Library where possible, removing unused
libraries like ActionBarSherlock, SherlockNavDrawer, and the
numberpicker backport. Use Holo Everywhere for UI consistency.
Fix actionbar title android 2.2 & 2.3 (Detailview)
Fix Horizontal lines in (EPDF -> Detailview)

Unify Anime/MangaNetworkTask callback interface

The callback functions always contain the same logic for Anime and
Manga, so they can be unified in on function. This removes some
duplicated code and avoids repetitions if something needs to be changed
in the callbacks.
So now there is only one callback for Anime/MangaNetworkTask:
onNetworkTaskFinished, without type separation. To determine the list
type the function has the additional ListType parameter 'type'.

Unify Anime/MangaNetworkTask callback interface

Implement SwipeRefreshLayout

Forced sync is now possible by swiping down like e. g. in the G+ or
GMail-App.
Only enable swipe refresh for own list
Don't try to sync if there is no connection

Use synctask() for forced sync

forcesync() has done the same, so it was implemented twice (thx @ratan12
for pointing at it).

Fix notifications for synctask()

Only disable notification for swipe refresh.

Don't use holo colors from android resources

They are available for API 14+ only
Show loading indicator if forced update and clear=true

Merge pull request #180 from d-sko/swipe_refresh

Implement SwipeRefreshLayout
Fix results from previous search are shown (Search)

Merge pull request #187 from ratan12/Fix_search

Fix results from previous search are shown (Search)

Unify Anime/MangaNetworkTask

They are doing the same, so they can be easily unified. This makes less
and cleaner code.
Also changed GET and GETDETAILS tasks to return Anime/Manga objects
instead of ArrayLists with only one element (now possible as the task's
return type is Object since #176).

Implement NetworkTask cancelling

Don't continue loading data if the user selects an other list. This
prevents unnecessary loading of useless data and fixes #190.

Exception are FORCESYNC-tasks, there is no reason to interrupt them.
Instead let them finish but don't display results (thats why there is
the new 'cancelled' parameter in the callback function).

Cancellation code is a little more complex as it could be because of our
low minimum API level. It can be simplified as soon as we drop < API 11.
Only display network error info if it is actually a network error

Disable swipe refresh for SearchActivity

This is not needed there and causes a crash.

Merge pull request #196 from d-sko/networktask_fix

Don't return null for list tasks with empty results in NetworkTask
Don't show swipe refresh animation for search

Don't declare af and mf in Home as static

Static variables are considered as bad practise in most cases and can
cause subtle bugs as well as GC-problems and should be avoided if
possible. Also there is not really a reason for them to be static in
Home so generate them dynamically.

SearchActivity improved

- no static af & mf
- rename HomeSectionsPagerAdapter to SectionsPagerAdapter and use it
for SearchActivity too
- improved search intent handling

Error callback for NetworkTask

NetworkTask now has an error callback. In case of an error
onNetworkTaskError() is called instead of onNetworkTaskFinished. So
onNetworkTaskFinished is never called if there was an error in the
NetworkTask.
better af & mf assignment

Use ListType-variable instead of boolean for type definition

ListType is made for this, so use it :)

Remove static callback in SearchActivity

- replaced by callback interface: onRecordsLoadingFinished()
- improved crouton messages: always show only one crouton, not two if
af & mf tasks failed, also show a crouton if sync failed

Don't set taskjob in SectionsPagerAdapter

Avoids unnecessary getRecords()-call in SearchActivity
Fix some messed up indents
Fix possible NPE

Remove useless resetPage()

getRecords() calls resetPage() if clear is true, which is always the
case here.
isEmpty is API 9+ so remove it

No need to call getRecords in onCreateView

Just refresh if there are records (e. g. after rotation)

Fix NetworkTask error handling

The tasks which return paged results return a 404 if the page is
invalid, so handle this properly.
Fix infinite calling of getRecords when reached last page
Fix loading more another page on rotation

Keep own list filter when loading more pages on other list

Fixes bug: the filter on the own list was overwritten when more pages
were loaded on an other page (like upcoming).

Do list updates based on broadcasts

Now everytime a WriteDetailsTask finished it sends a broadcast which is
received by IGF. If the IGF currently shows the users list and has the
same ListType as returned by the broadcast callback it will update the
list.
This way we're only updating lists if necessary.

Correct jobReturnsPagedResults()

- use isList()
- Search does not return paged results
Fix loading indicator displaying
Better empty list handling in onAttach()
Don't show swipe refresh animation when clearing
Fix scroll position reset in resetPage()

Fix some missing translations in DetailView

These are gone missing in the in the last rewrite:
- media status
- media type
- user status for manga
Now they're back :)

Bump Version

Bump the version number so that any crash reports properly show as a
pre-release build.

Fix first sync after login

autosync() was not working because af and mf are null in onCreate().
Now this is done in onIGFReady().

Fix possible SQLite error 1802

After deleting the database (on logout), no new one was created because
the MALSqlHelper was not recreated for two reasons:
- the MALSqlHelper is designed as singleton (object is retrieved by
calling getHelper()), but instance was not unset after deleting the
database
- malSqlHelper was defined as static in DatabaseManager, so even fixing
the first point would not fix the bug, because all instances of
DatabaseManager share the same malSqlHelper

Now MALSqlHelper has the new function deleteDatabase() that deletes the
database and sets instance to null so the next call to getHelper() will
recreate the database. Also malSqlHelper is not defined as static in
DatabaseManager. Also cancel running NetworkTasks on logout to make sure
that the tasks are not accessing the database when it is deleted.
Remove unused MALManager variables

Save Anime-/Mangalist in relation table

This allows us to store the lists of friends too! Updated all related
functions (they now have a username or userId parameter to define the
user).
Also removed the recordId field from the anime and manga table: as the
ID's provided by the API are unique we can use them directly.

Save all API details (part 1)

Now the database can store all details provided by the API:
- added required fields to the anime and manga tables
- added genre and tag tables
- added relation tables to store genres, tags and record relations (like
side stories, sequels, alternative versions...)
- updated DatabaseManager to save the new informations (except for
record relations, this will be part 2 of this commit ;) )
Fix database upgrade from previous version

Save all API details (part 2)

Save record relations (side stories, adaptations, summaries etc.)

Save all API details (part 3)

Save other titles of records.

Don't save the synopsis on database upgrade

This way we can force all records to be updated when loaded for the
first time in DetailView to get the new details.
Save anime prequels and sequels
Fixed search

Only pass full record on own lists

... as other lists like search or toplists (most popular) don't have
additional informations like record relations, genres, tags and other
titles.

Try to load the record from the own anime-/mangalist

If DetailView is called from an not-stored list (search result,
toplist), then it tries to load the record from the own anime-/mangalist
to show personal details (status, rating). Only if that fails it loads
the record from the API.
Fix search result page loading

Do not pass complete records to DetailView

Without passing the full record to the DV we don't need to get all
record details in the anime-/mangalist which results in faster load
times.

Fix details never saved

GETDETAILS tasks never saved the new record details because saveAnime()/
-Manga() was not updating without a username. Also changed getRecord()
in DetailView so a swipe action will always fetch from the API.

Implement some cleanup functions

As now all records are accessed by relations (anime-/mangalist or record
relations like prequels, adaptations etc.) all records in the database
that are not related somehow are 'dead' records. So I implemented some
functions to delete them:
- deleteFrom(Anime/Manga)List() now checks if the deleted record is
still related to other records and deletes it if not
- a full sync now also checks for unrelated records and deletes them

getRecords() should do something useful when offline

... so now it tries to get the record from the Database and shows a
crouton message if this didn't work.

Fix sync after beeing offline

When using the '+1 watched/read' button on IGF the dirty flag was not
set if offline, so these changes where not synced to MAL.
Also don't show the loading indicator when the connection is back and
changes are synced, only show the refresh animation.
Fix two possible NPEs

Unify AnimeRecordStub and MangaRecordStub in RecordStub

They were only separated for deserialization by retrofit, but that can
be handled in one class. Basically the getId() function just has to
return the correct variable.
Also added a check to the relation saving functions to prevent saving
a record with 0 as id.
Add getType() to RecordStub to know if it is Anime or Manga
Save parent story

Adjust other_titles to API fixes

Other_titles is now always a two dimensional array, so change it in the
response class accordingly.
Search fix after rebasing

Gradle update for Android Studio 1.0

This updates the gradle configuration to support AS 1.0. It also removes
the proguard config as runProguard is not longer available (is now
'minifyEnabled') and it was disabled anyway.

Add statusbar color for Android 5 and simplify statusbar coloring

This adds a darker version of the Actionbar color for the statusbar on
Android 5 and also simplifies setting the actionbar color.

Don't capitalize the user status string

This can be grammatically wrong (e. g. in german).
